en: Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation

description.zh-cn: 一个由中国共产党提出的政治口号和发展目标，旨在恢复中华民族在世界上的历史地位和影响力。自习近平上任以来，该构想通过“中国梦”等概念得到进一步推广。
description.en: A political slogan and development goal proposed by the Chinese Communist Party, aiming to restore the historical status and influence of the Chinese nation in the world. Since Xi Jinping took office, this vision has been further promoted through concepts such as the 'Chinese Dream'.

en: 16th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六次全国代表大会，在此次会议的报告中首次提出了“中华民族伟大复兴”的口号。
description.en: The 16th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party, in whose report the slogan 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation' was first proposed.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代领导核心，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。他在中共十八大上任后，在“中华民族伟大复兴”的基础上提出了“中国梦”构想。
description.en: The fifth-generation leadership core of the Chinese Communist Party, currently serving as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. After taking office at the 18th Party Congress, he proposed the 'Chinese Dream' concept based on the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由时任中共中央总书记习近平于2012年提出，其核心目标是“中华民族伟大复兴”。
description.en: A concept introduced by then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Xi Jinping in 2012, with its core goal being the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国国父，曾提出“振兴中华”的口号。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary, the founding father of the Republic of China, who coined the slogan 'Rejuvenate China'.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山提出的政治口号，是“中华民族伟大复兴”概念的前身之一。
description.en: A political slogan proposed by Sun Yat-sen, one of the precursors to the concept of the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

en: 15th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十五次全国代表大会，其报告中提出了“中华民族实现全面振兴”的说法。
description.en: The 15th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party, whose report proposed the idea of 'achieving the comprehensive revitalization of the Chinese nation'.

description.zh-cn: 二十世纪中期中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。其胜利被中国官方视为中华民族从近代危机走向伟大复兴的历史转折点。
description.en: A full-scale war in the mid-20th century where China resisted Japanese invasion. Its victory is regarded by Chinese officials as a historical turning point for the Chinese nation from modern crisis to great rejuvenation.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。官方论述称其在中国人民抗日战争中发挥了中流砥柱作用。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Official discourse claims it played a mainstay role in the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression.

nodes.id: 中国现代国际关系研究院

zh-cn: 中国现代国际关系研究院
en: China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations

description.zh-cn: 中国的国际关系研究机构。
description.en: A Chinese research institute for international relations.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代国际关系研究院院长。
description.en: President of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家通讯社之一。
description.en: One of China's state-level news agencies.

description.zh-cn: 一次中美两国高层官员的战略对话。期间，中方代表杨洁篪发表了强硬言论。
description.en: A strategic dialogue between high-level officials from China and the United States, during which Chinese representative Yang Jiechi made assertive remarks.

en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中央外事工作委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中共中央处理外事事务的议事协调机构的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office for the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, a deliberation and coordination body of the CCP Central Committee handling foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任。他在2021年中美高层阿拉斯加会谈上对美方代表发表了强硬言论。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission. He made assertive remarks to the US representatives at the 2021 Sino-American summit in Alaska.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国。在2021年中美高层阿拉斯加会谈中，其代表被杨洁篪斥责“没有资格在中国的面前说，你们从实力的地位出发同中国谈话”。
description.en: A federal republic in North America. During the 2021 Sino-American summit in Alaska, its representatives were rebuked by Yang Jiechi, who stated, 'you are not qualified to say to China that you speak to China from a position of strength'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。为提倡“中华民族伟大复兴”，中国官方对其评价被指进一步提升，同时淡化其发动多次政治运动所造成的负面影响。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. To promote the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation,' his official evaluation is said to have been further elevated, while downplaying the negative impacts of the numerous political movements he launched.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国社会造成了巨大冲击。这是被提及的由毛泽东主导的多个政治运动之一。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong that caused immense turmoil in Chinese society. It is one of several political campaigns led by Mao mentioned in the text.

zh-cn: 一个民族，一个帝国，一个元首
en: One People, One Empire, One Leader

description.zh-cn: 阿道夫·希特勒在纳粹德国使用的个人头衔，及其相关的政治口号。有分析将其与习近平的“中华民族伟大复兴”作比较。
description.en: The personal title used by Adolf Hitler in Nazi Germany, and its associated political slogan. Some analyses compare it with Xi Jinping's 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国的元首，纳粹党领袖。他的口号和民族复兴的说法被一些分析家用来与习近平的“中华民族伟大复兴”进行比较。
description.en: The Führer of Nazi Germany and leader of the Nazi Party. His slogans and rhetoric of national rejuvenation are used by some analysts for comparison with Xi Jinping's 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

description.zh-cn: 一种强调民族利益和文化认同的意识形态。有分析认为，习近平提倡的“中华民族伟大复兴”推动了中国的民族主义情绪。
description.en: An ideology that emphasizes national interests and cultural identity. Some analyses suggest that the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation' promoted by Xi Jinping has fueled nationalist sentiments in China.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年间由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治下的德国。有分析指习近平领导下的中国很像二战前的纳粹德国。
description.en: Germany under the rule of Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party from 1933 to 1945. Some analyses suggest that China under Xi Jinping's leadership resembles pre-World War II Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。其国际形象和声誉受到“中华民族伟大复兴”策略、2019冠状病毒病疫情等多种因素的影响。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Chinese Communist Party. Its international image and reputation are influenced by various factors, including the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation' strategy and the COVID-19 pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府提出的跨国经济带发展倡议，被视为实现中华民族伟大复兴的策略之一。
description.en: A transnational economic belt development initiative proposed by the Chinese government, regarded as one of the strategies to achieve the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的大流行病。与之相关的争议导致中国在部分西方国家的声誉下降。
description.en: A global pandemic. Controversies related to it led to a decline in China's reputation in some Western countries.

description.zh-cn: 美国的民意调查和研究机构。其2020年的一项调查显示，世界多个主要国家对中国的负面看法达到历史新高。
description.en: An American public opinion polling and research organization. A 2020 survey it conducted showed that negative views of China reached historic highs in many major countries.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国在全球经济、政治和军事地位上的显著提升。在中国民众看来，西方国家对中国的负面观感升高是中国崛起的结果。
description.en: Refers to the significant increase in the People's Republic of China's global economic, political, and military standing. In the view of the Chinese public, the rise in negative Western perceptions of China is a result of China's rise.

description.zh-cn: 2002年中共十六大报告首次提出了“实现中华民族伟大复兴”的口号。
description.en: The report of the 16th CCP National Congress in 2002 first proposed the slogan 'achieve the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 习近平在2012年中共十八大后就任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping assumed the office of General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee after the 18th Party Congress in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 习近平就任中共中央总书记后，在“中华民族伟大复兴”的基础上提出了“中国梦”构想。
description.en: After becoming General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Xi Jinping proposed the 'Chinese Dream' concept based on the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

description.zh-cn: “中国梦”构想是在“中华民族伟大复兴”这一口号的基础上提出的，是其具体化的体现。
description.en: The 'Chinese Dream' concept was proposed on the basis of the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation' slogan and is its concretization.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山提出了“振兴中华”的口号。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen proposed the slogan 'Rejuvenate China'.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山的“振兴中华”口号被视为“中华民族伟大复兴”概念的前身。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen's slogan 'Rejuvenate China' is considered a precursor to the concept of the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation'.

description.zh-cn: 1997年中共十五大的报告提出“中华民族实现全面振兴”，为后来的“伟大复兴”口号奠定了基础。
description.en: The report of the 15th CCP National Congress in 1997 proposed 'achieving the comprehensive revitalization of the Chinese nation,' laying the foundation for the later 'great rejuvenation' slogan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民抗日战争的胜利被官方视为中华民族从近代以来陷入深重危机走向伟大复兴的历史转折点。
description.en: The victory of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression is regarded by officials as the historical turning point for the Chinese nation from a deep modern crisis towards great rejuvenation.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方论述认为，中国共产党在领导中国走向民族复兴的过程中发挥了核心作用。
description.en: Official Chinese discourse holds that the Chinese Communist Party has played a core role in leading China towards national rejuvenation.

relationships.target: 中国现代国际关系研究院

description.zh-cn: 袁鹏是中国现代国际关系研究院的院长。
description.en: Yuan Peng is the President of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations.

description.zh-cn: 在2021年中美高层阿拉斯加会谈中，杨洁篪斥责美国代表“你们没有资格在中国的面前说，你们从实力的地位出发同中国谈话”。
description.en: During the 2021 Sino-American summit in Alaska, Yang Jiechi rebuked the U.S. representatives, stating, 'you are not qualified to say to China that you speak to China from a position of strength'.

description.zh-cn: 为提倡中华民族伟大复兴，中国官方对毛泽东的历史评价被进一步提升，并强调其对民族复兴的贡献。
description.en: In order to promote the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, the official historical evaluation of Mao Zedong has been further elevated, emphasizing his contributions to national rejuvenation.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东发动并主导了文化大革命等一系列政治运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong initiated and led the Cultural Revolution and a series of other political movements.

description.zh-cn: 有分析将习近平的“中华民族伟大复兴”与希特勒“一个民族，一个帝国，一个元首”的口号进行比较，认为两者在话术上有相似之处。
description.en: Some analyses compare Xi Jinping's 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation' with Hitler's slogan 'One People, One Empire, One Leader,' suggesting similarities in their rhetoric.

description.zh-cn: 阿道夫·希特勒在纳粹德国时期使用了“元首”头衔及相关的“一个民族，一个帝国，一个元首”的政治口号。
description.en: Adolf Hitler used the title 'Führer' and the related political slogan 'One People, One Empire, One Leader' during the Nazi Germany era.

description.zh-cn: 有分析指出，习近平提倡的“中华民族伟大复兴”梦推动了中国的民族主义情绪。
description.en: Analyses indicate that the 'Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation' dream promoted by Xi Jinping has fueled nationalist sentiments in China.

description.zh-cn: 有分析认为，习近平领导下的中国与二战前的纳粹德国（第三帝国）存在相似之处。
description.en: Some analyses suggest there are similarities between China under Xi Jinping's leadership and pre-World War II Nazi Germany (the Third Reich).

description.zh-cn: “一带一路”是中国为实现中华民族伟大复兴而提倡的多个策略之一。
description.en: 'The Belt and Road Initiative' is one of several strategies promoted by China to achieve the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

description.zh-cn: 关于2019冠状病毒病爆发的有关争议导致中华人民共和国在部分西方国家间的声誉下降。
description.en: Controversies surrounding the outbreak of COVID-19 led to a decline in the People's Republic of China's reputation among some Western countries.

description.zh-cn: 皮尤研究中心于2020年10月公布的民意调查显示，多个主要国家对中国的负面观感达到历史新高，从而对中国的国际形象造成了负面影响。
description.en: A public opinion poll released by the Pew Research Center in October 2020 showed that negative views of China in several major countries reached historic highs, thereby negatively impacting China's international image.

description.zh-cn: 在中国民众看来，西方国家对中国的负面观感升高正是中国崛起的结果，这反映了中国崛起在国际关系中面临的阻力。
description.en: In the view of the Chinese public, the rise in negative Western perceptions of China is a result of China's rise, reflecting the resistance faced by China's rise in international relations.
